nodes.bodyText: I am not seeing how this case is now being accounted for?

The repository root object is just treated like every other object. There's no need for its metadata files to be named differently. At least, I was unable to identify a reason for them to be treated differently based on my analysis of the code, but perhaps I missed something.

Besides this question, this pull-request should be good to go. It fixes the broken rebuild scenario.
It would be good to know from others if root requires special handling.
